mapper.select: SELECT proj_id, proj_name, proj_code, proj_description, start_date, end_date FROM tbl_project_mst WHERE del_flag = 0 ORDER BY proj_id DESC, reg_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_project_mst( proj_name, proj_code, proj_description, start_date, end_date, reg_id ) VALUES ( #{proj_name}, #{proj_code}, #{proj_description}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, 1 );
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_project_mst SET proj_name=#{project.proj_name}, proj_code=#{project.proj_code}, proj_description=#{project.proj_description}, start_date=#{project.start_date}, end_date=#{project.end_date}, update_id = 1 WHERE proj_id = #{id}
